snippet: Eagles Coach Andy Reid said he did not like the direction his team (3-3) was heading, so he replaced his defensive coordinator, Juan Castillo, and signaled there could be more changes.
abstract: Analysis; Philadelphia Eagles coach Andy Reid fires defensive coordinator Juan Castillo and replaces him with defensive backs coach Todd Bowles, two days after an embarrassing loss to the Detroit Lions; indicates that other changes may be coming.
lead_paragraph: Eagles Coach Andy Reid said he did not like the direction his team (3-3) was heading, so he replaced his defensive coordinator, Juan Castillo, and signaled there could be more changes.

headline.seo: In State of Disrepair, Eagles Fire Defensive Coordinator Juan Castillo
headline.main: Reid Cuts Losses While He Still Can
headline.print_headline: Reid Cuts Losses While He Still Can
